author: MekkCyber
message:
Raising error when quantizing a quantized model (#39998)

* error when quantizing a quantized model

files.patch:
@@ -213,6 +213,12 @@ def merge_quantization_configs(
             else:
                 quantization_config = AutoQuantizationConfig.from_dict(quantization_config)
 
+        if quantization_config.__class__.__name__ != quantization_config_from_args.__class__.__name__:
+            raise ValueError(
+                f"The model is quantized with {quantization_config.__class__.__name__} but you are passing a {quantization_config_from_args.__class__.__name__} config. "
